title: Bride and Prejudice's Nathan gets 'thug life' 'tattooed' on toddler Starr-Armani
text:
Bride and Prejudice's Nathan Bereyne gave his two-year-old daughter Starr-Armani a fake 'thug life' tattoo on her tummy to match his own tattooed torso.

The Gold Coast bodybuilder, 25, had little Starr-Armani inked-up in August at the Royal Queensland Show.

Starr's fake tattoo matches Nathan's own real tattoo, which reads 'Aussie mongrel born 'n' bred'.

'Aussie mongrel born 'n' bred!' Bride and Prejudice's Nathan gave his two-year-old daughter Starr-Armani a fake 'thug life' tattoo on her tummy to match his own tattooed torso

Sharing a photo of the touching father-daughter moment to Instagram, Nathan wrote: 'Fun at the Ekka with our thug baby!'

Starr's mum Codie Lea, 21, commented on the post, writing: 'Twins! She wants to be too much like you lol.'

Nathan and Codie Lea are currently feuding with Nathan's meddling mum Laurelle on the new season of Bride and Prejudice.

Oh mama! Starr-Armani's mum Codie Lea, 21, (pictured) commented on the post, writing: 'Twins! She wants to be too much like you lol'

The tension between Laurelle and the young couple stems from a feud involving baby Starr-Armani.

According to Codie, Laurelle came into her home while she was sleeping and took an unvaccinated Starr-Armani out shopping without permission when she was just three weeks old.

However, Laurelle maintains that Nathan had asked her to babysit Starr that day.

Family feud: Nathan and Codie Lea are currently feuding with Nathan's meddling mum Laurelle on the new season of Bride and Prejudice

'I don't deserve to have restrictions on my granddaughter,' she said. 'I'll do what it takes to see my granddaughter, but I'm not going to bow down to a 20-year-old plastic b***h.'

Laurelle has since threatened to take the couple to court to get visitation rights to see Starr-Armani.

'If it goes to court, I have just as much right to see my granddaughter as you do,' she told Nathan on Wednesday's episode.

'I don't deserve to have restrictions on my granddaughter': Laurelle has threatened to take the couple to court to get visitation rights to see Starr-Armani

'You have as much right as I give you': Nathan has stuck to his guns and refused to bow down to his meddling mum Laurelle

'You have as much right as I give you,' Nathan responded. 'We're her parents and that's how it works.'

When Codie Lea arrived to join the conversation, Laurelle unleashed on her future daughter-in-law with a string of expletives.

'Why is that you will never accept me?' asks a stunned Codie.

'Because you're a plastic b***h!' raged Laurelle. 'Everything on you is fake. Fake hair, fake lips, fake boobs, fake eyelashes, fake tan - you're plastic!'
description: Bride and Prejudice's Nathan Bereyne gave his two-year-old daughter Starr-Armani a fake 'thug life' tattoo on her tummy to match his own tattooed torso.
